Posted By: Jim
I have several t206 Hall of Famers for sale.  They are all graded by PSA.  They are:
1) Home Run Baker PSA 3 ($150) SOLD
2) Jake Beckley Polar Bear PSA 3 ($110)
3) Roger Bresnahan w/ Bat PSA 3 ($100)
4) John McGraw Portrait w/o Cap PSA 1 ($75) High End 1
5) Tris Speaker PSA 1 ($110) SOLD
6) Zack Wheat PSA 3 ($120) SOLD
7) Vic Willis Pittsburg Portrait PSA 3 ($100) 
If you have questions or would like to see scans, please contact me at jrths07@yahoo.com
